summary: A young man fresh out of law school tries to win a reprieve for his racist grandfather who is on death row.
cast: Chris O'Donnell|Gene Hackman|Faye Dunaway|Robert Prosky|Raymond J. Pinckes|Dan Beene|James Geralden|Michelle Davison|Jack Conley|Stephanie Bell Flynt|Ruby Wilson|Joe Meek|Anthony Kopcynski|Ken Colquitt|Neil Barton|Gilbert Ivan Johnson|Jerry Gauny|Ed Siebert|Bob Rummler|Disraeli Ellison|Rod Phillips|Jeff Sanders|Richard T. Muñoz|Clee Cottel|Ian Brady|Sam Bologna|Charles Swain|Tony Scott Sherron|Kurtis Sanders|Vince Canlas|Clay Cranford|Stuart Greenwell|John Kerry|Justin Mabry|Douglas Swander|Shayne Tingle|Alexandra Wright
title: Cámara sellada
